data.name: Siberian Village Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Simulator of life in a Siberian village. You have to become an entrepreneur in a semi-abandoned village and develop its economy. Feel like an ordinary villager in an unusual village.

* Extract oil
* Catch fish
* Open a store
* Build a bar
* Take a ride on the UAZ "Loaf"
* And restore the village

Spring Siberian snow and northern lights at night will not leave anyone indifferent.
Beautiful graphics and an abundance of mechanics. We hope you enjoy it)
data.about_the_game:
Simulator of life in a Siberian village. You have to become an entrepreneur in a semi-abandoned village and develop its economy. Feel like an ordinary villager in an unusual village.

* Extract oil

Spring Siberian snow and northern lights at night will not leave anyone indifferent.
Beautiful graphics and an abundance of mechanics. We hope you enjoy it)
data.short_description: Simulator of life in a Siberian village. Feel like an ordinary villager, in an unusual village. Extract oil, catch fish and revive the village. Beautiful graphics and post-Soviet surroundings will not leave anyone indifferent...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 900-series 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
